extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by CVE-2023-21715 or CVE-2023-23376 by reviewing the installed software versions and configurations.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by CVE-2023-21715 or CVE-2023-23376?

extracted_playbook.title: Install Security Updates
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the latest security updates provided by Microsoft to mitigate the vulnerabilities CVE-2023-21715 and CVE-2023-23376.
